newsitem.title: USA: Delta, SkyWest extend alliance for 5 years.
newsitem.headline: Delta, SkyWest extend alliance for 5 years.

text.p: Delta Air Lines and SkyWest Airlines said Tuesday they agreed to extend their Delta Connection alliance for a five-year period.

Under the new contract, SkyWest will provide regional feed service as a commuter partner under the Delta code designator from Los Angeles to eight destinations, according to a press release issued by the companies.
At the Salt Lake City hub, the two carriers will "explore further growth opportunities for SkyWest service," according to the release.
Salt Lake City is Delta's third largest hub with 177 Delta flights daily.
